name: Dan Edmonds
body:
###hi, i'm dan edmonds.
I'm a passionate user interface designer and front-end developer residing just outside of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. I specialize in WordPress development and I'm currently the Interactive Developer at PMI.

I love crafting beautiful and intuitive design solutions with an emphasis on simplicity, usability, and accessibility. My admiration for web standards is perfectly complemented by executing clean, hand-coded mark-up to build responsive, optimized, cross-browser compatible sites.

When I'm not behind my MacBook Pro, you'll find me spending time with my fianc√©e, watching Pixar films or hockey, or speeding on a winding back road in my little slice of Europe.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
